turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, would you mind ordering a coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where am I ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It will be the Starbucks on Pine Street in Spartanburg.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'd like a white mocha today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a venti like you usually get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not today, let's make it a grande, and be sure it's decaf.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. You want a grande decaf white mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, and have them make it with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so a grande decaf white mocha with soy milk... do you still want the whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream for me today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want this hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a grande iced decaf white mocha with soy and no whip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what, let's make that a venti after all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, a venti iced white mocha with soy milk and no whip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, if you can place that order online I will pick it up on my way into the office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want me to order anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll place the online order now!
